curl-box.title: How to download a Box file from the command line
curl-box.excerpt: How to download a Box file (even private files) using curl.
curl-box.contents: curl -L https://api.box.com/2.0/files/[FILE ID]/content -H "Authorization: Bearer [DEVELOPER TOKEN]" -o [FILE NAME]First get the file ID from the URL in the browser. Then get the developer token by creating a new Box app (click the configuration tab). You can choose the file name to output to. View an example here.

grade-view.title: GradeView
grade-view.excerpt: My grades app for Fairfax County Public Schools.
grade-view.contents: If you have questions about the app, please contact me. If you'd like, you can open an issue or pull request on the GitHub repository. iOS, Android
